metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24331 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in TrouSerS through 0.3.14. If the tcsd daemon is started with root privileges, the tss user still has read and write access to the /etc/tcsd.conf file (which contains various settings related to this daemon).

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the Debian/Ubuntu package starts tcsd as the tss user, not as root, so this issue doesn't affect default configurations

criterions.comment: trousers: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
